issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Currently, branch-2.8 (and branch-2.8.2) have a findbugs warning due to the unused container variable in DockerLinuxContainerRuntime.
fields.summary: Remove unused container variable in DockerLinuxContainerRuntime

No test is included as this is removing an unused variable. The patch is needed and applies to branch-2.8 and branch-2.8.2. Let me know if I need to attach a patch specifically for 2.8.2.

Thanks for the patch!

+1 lgtm.  Committing this.
Thanks, Shane!  I committed this to branch-2.8 and branch-2.8.2.
